languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, с планеты, откуда мы только что отбыли, поднялись неопознанные серповидные корабли и стремительно идут на сближение, готовя орудия к бою! Приготовьтесь, сейчас будет жарко!"

"Lord Captain, unidentified sickle-shaped ships have taken off from the planet we just left. They're approaching swiftly and readying their weapons for battle. Get ready! It's about to get hot in here!"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, с планеты, откуда мы только что отбыли, поднялись неопознанные серповидные корабли и стремительно идут на сближение, готовя орудия к бою! Приготовьтесь, сейчас будет жарко!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, unidentified crescent-shaped ships have taken off from the planet we just left. They're approaching swiftly and readying their guns for battle. Get ready! It's about to get hot in here!"

"Lord Captain, unidentified crescent-shaped ships have taken off from the planet we just left. They're approaching swiftly and readying their guns for battle. Get ready! It's about to get hot in here!"

"Lord Captain, unidentified sickle-shaped ships have taken off from the planet we just left. They're approaching swiftly and readying their weapons for battle. Get ready! It's about to get hot in here!"

"Lord Captain, unidentified sickle-shaped ships have taken off from the planet we just left. They're approaching swiftly and readying their weapons for battle. Get ready! It's about to get hot in here!"

"Lord Captain, unidentified sickle-shaped ships have taken off from the planet we just left. They're approaching swiftly and readying their weapons for battle. Get ready! It's about to get hot in here!"

languages.text: “领主舰长，身份不明的镰刀型飞船从我们刚刚离开的行星起飞了。敌人正在迅速接近，武器也已经状态好了。我们必须做好准备！要开战了！”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, unidentified sickle-shaped ships have taken off from the planet we just left. They're approaching swiftly and readying their weapons for battle. Get ready! It's about to get hot in here!"

traits.locale_text: “领主舰长，身份不明的镰刀型飞船从我们刚刚离开的行星起飞了。敌人正在迅速接近，武器也已经状态好了。我们必须做好准备！要开战了！”

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, des vaisseaux non identifiés en forme de faucille viennent de décoller de la planète que nous avons quittée. Ils s'approchent rapidement et préparent leurs armes pour l'affrontement. Que tout le monde se tienne prêt, ça va secouer ! »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, unidentified sickle-shaped ships have taken off from the planet we just left. They're approaching swiftly and readying their weapons for battle. Get ready! It's about to get hot in here!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, des vaisseaux non identifiés en forme de faucille viennent de décoller de la planète que nous avons quittée. Ils s'approchent rapidement et préparent leurs armes pour l'affrontement. Que tout le monde se tienne prêt, ça va secouer ! »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, nicht identifizierte, sichelförmige Schiffe sind von dem Planeten gestartet, von dem wir eben selbst gestartet sind. Sie nähern sich extrem schnell und stellen ihre Waffen auf Kampf. Bereit machen! Gleich wird es hier hitzig!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, unidentified sickle-shaped ships have taken off from the planet we just left. They're approaching swiftly and readying their weapons for battle. Get ready! It's about to get hot in here!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, nicht identifizierte, sichelförmige Schiffe sind von dem Planeten gestartet, von dem wir eben selbst gestartet sind. Sie nähern sich extrem schnell und stellen ihre Waffen auf Kampf. Bereit machen! Gleich wird es hier hitzig!"

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, unas naves desconocidas con forma de hoz han despegado del planeta que acabamos de abandonar. Se están acercando a toda velocidad y están sacando sus armas. ¡Prepárese! ¡Esto se va a poner al rojo vivo en un abrir y cerrar de ojos!».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, unidentified sickle-shaped ships have taken off from the planet we just left. They're approaching swiftly and readying their weapons for battle. Get ready! It's about to get hot in here!"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, unas naves desconocidas con forma de hoz han despegado del planeta que acabamos de abandonar. Se están acercando a toda velocidad y están sacando sus armas. ¡Prepárese! ¡Esto se va a poner al rojo vivo en un abrir y cerrar de ojos!».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、未確認の鎌型船が離脱した惑星から離陸しました。急速に接近し、戦闘用の武器を準備しています。今すぐ準備を！ここは間もなく戦場になります！」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, unidentified sickle-shaped ships have taken off from the planet we just left. They're approaching swiftly and readying their weapons for battle. Get ready! It's about to get hot in here!"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、未確認の鎌型船が離脱した惑星から離陸しました。急速に接近し、戦闘用の武器を準備しています。今すぐ準備を！ここは間もなく戦場になります！」

languages.text: "Orak şeklinde ve tanımlanamayan bazı gemiler, az evvel ayrıldığımız gezegenden kalkış yaptı Lord Kaptan. Hızla yaklaşmakta ve silahlarını tertip etmekteler. Vaziyet alın! Ortalık karışacak!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, unidentified sickle-shaped ships have taken off from the planet we just left. They're approaching swiftly and readying their weapons for battle. Get ready! It's about to get hot in here!"
